verses.translation: When the sky has split [open]
And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
verses.transliteration: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

verses.translation: And when the earth has been extended
And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
verses.transliteration: Wa alqat maa feehaa wa takhallat

verses.translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
verses.transliteration: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

verses.arabic: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰا فَمُلَـٰقِیهِ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
verses.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad han famulaaqeeh

verses.translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
verses.transliteration: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenih

verses.translation: He will be judged with an easy account
And return to his people in happiness.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
verses.translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
verses.transliteration: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih

verses.translation: He will cry out for destruction
And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰۤۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِیرࣰا
verses.translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
verses.transliteration: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa

verses.translation: So I swear by the twilight glow
And [by] the night and what it envelops
And [by] the moon when it becomes full
[That] you will surely experience state after state.
So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا یَسۡجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjudoon

verses.translation: But those who have disbelieved deny,
And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
verses.transliteration: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
